thread.title: Apple, Microsoft tangle with Justice Department over data access

author: New York Times
title: Apple, Microsoft tangle with Justice Department over data access
text: WASHINGTON â€” In an investigation involving guns and drugs, the Justice Department obtained a court order this summer demanding that Apple turn over, in real time, text messages between suspects using iPhones.
